name: sap.xs.nodejs.debug.DebugProcessor
description: Debug Processor interface providing access to single step and ressume/suspend actions.

stepOut.description: Steps out of the function call.

suspend.description: Stops on the next JavaScript statement.

isConnected.description: Whether a debug session is active.

returns.description: True if a session is active, false otherwise.

canStepOver.description: Distinguishes whether step over can be processed.

returns.description: True if step over can be processed, false otherwise.

canStepInto.description: Distinguishes whether step into can be processed.

returns.description: True if step into can be processed, false otherwise.

canStepOut.description: Distinguishes whether step out can be processed.

returns.description: True if step out can be processed, false otherwise.

canResume.description: Distinguishes whether resume can be processed.

returns.description: True if resume can be processed, false otherwise.

canSuspend.description: Distinguishes whether suspend can be processed.

returns.description: True if suspend can be processed, false otherwise.
